adjectives.description: hypochondriacal (comparative more hypochondriacal, superlative most hypochondriacal)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Coming from the hypochondria; pertaining to or caused by depressive spirits.
examples: Fracastorius, Fallopius, and others, being to give their sentence of a party labouring of hypochondriacal melancholy, could not find out by the symptoms which part was most especially affected […].
